name: hexi christmas stocking
sizes_available: approx 11" [28 cm] wide x 12½" [32 cm] long.
notes:
discover the hexagon granny - the quickest and most fun way to make crochet stockings this season. stitched in red heart super saver, you have a world of color to choose from for making your custom version of this pattern. this entertaining project teaches you granny clusters in a hexagon shape with color changes, simple reverse single crochet top edging, chain hanging loop, and more! simply select 4 shades and make a few to delight both family and friends.

materials
red heart® super saver™ (7 oz/198 g; 364 yds/333 m)
version 1
contrast a turqua (0512) 1 ball or 94 yds/85.5 m
contrast b pretty n’ pink (0722) 1 ball or 24 yds/22 m
contrast c spring green (0672) 1 ball or 32 yds/29 m
contrast d soft white (0316) 1 ball or 24 yds/22 m

version 2
contrast a turqua (0512) 1 ball or 32 yds/29 m
contrast b spring green (0672) 1 ball or 32 yds/29 m
contrast c pretty n’ pink (0722) 1 ball or 80 yds/73 m
contrast d soft white (0316) 1 ball or 80 yds/73 m

measurements
approx 11" [28 cm] wide x 12½" [32 cm] long.
